A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Its not quite a great movie but its not a bad movie. I would say it has some moments that dont feel quite right compared to the other movies in this universe\, but\, it also surprised me with some good character development and some unorthodox plot twists which was refreshing after VII turned out to be more or less a predictable rehash of old tropes.\n\nIm now really curious to see how IX ties this all up.
